DataElement.preferredName: PACE 11 Got Consistent Information from Doctors and Nurses Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether they got consistent information from all their doctors and nurses; everyone was on the same page, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Assessment of Cancer Communication Experiences Got Consistent Information from Doctors and Nurses Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A survey tool designed to assess a patient?s perspective on the communication they had over the course of their cancer care, with a focus on the patient?s perception of whether specific communication goals had been achieved._A question about whether an individual is getting or has gotten consistent information from all their doctors and nurses, and everyone is or was on the same page._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
